description: This course will provide online Black Belt certification in Lean Six Sigma. Six Sigma is one of the most important quality paradigms of the last several decades and is used by thousands of top firms including GE, Honeywell, Bank of America, Norfolk Grummon and many others worldwide to significantly improve their top and bottom lines. This course will combine interesting written lectures videos and will utilize action learning where students learn by actually doing projects which can have an immediate impact on their business. The training of this program will be similar to the rigorous training programs at General Electric and Motorola. Students will be trained by one of the world's top leaders in business analytics and Six Sigma and at the end of the course will obtain the prestigious certification of Black Belt in Lean Six Sigma.
title: Lean Six Sigma BB Training Inspired from GE and Motorola
